to grow/to plant/to insert/to force on sb/to fall head first
muscle/tendon/veins visible under the skin/sth resembling tendons or veins (e.g. fiber in a vegetable)

to stir up trouble
dull-witted and tongue-tied

to sow discord everywhere
lit. the dog that bites doesn't show its teeth (idiom)/fig. the most sinister of people can look quite harmless

definition: to poke one's head in and pry (idiom); to spy/nosy

definition: stupid (Wu dialect)
